title: Remembering Anthony Bourdain | The Watch (Ep. 265)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald reflect on the life and impact of the late Anthony Bourdain (1:30). Later they talk about meeting Donald Glover and the rest of the 'Atlanta' cast at a panel they moderated for FYC (33:00) and discuss 'A Star Is Born,' 'Widows,' and 'First Man' as awards bait (40:34).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
